nodes.text: Tigo-Lee was the name given to a female wind-truster who was the personal mount of Kailla-Glon-Vow, a Lew'elan elder. Kailla's granddaughter Aya-Glon rode Tigo-Lee while guiding Luke Skywalker while the Jedi Knight attempted to circumvent the globe on Lew'el astride a flying wind-truster.
